mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, rownum as rnum from (SELECT num, name, phone, rname, rphone, addr, rsdate, place, basic, big, over, reservetype, id FROM reserve where id=#{id} and reservetype='leave_insertform' ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, rownum as rnum from (SELECT num, name, phone, rname, rphone, addr, rsdate, place, basic, big, over, reservetype, id FROM reserve where id=#{id} and reservetype='ent_insertform' ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM reserve where id=#{id} and reservetype='leave_insertform'
SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM reserve where id=#{id} and reservetype='ent_insertform'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reserve (num, name, phone, rname, rphone, rsdate, place, basic, big, over, reservetype, id) VALUES(reserve_seq.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{phone}, #{rname}, #{rphone}, TO_DATE(#{rsdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI'), #{place}, #{basic}, #{big}, #{over}, #{reservetype}, #{id})
